function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation leading to a high number of secondary infections before and after lockdown.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, implement air purifiers, and enforce guidelines for indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Occupants, visitors, employees.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, employers."},{"Description":"Risk of infection in regularly attended indoor spaces due to prolonged exposure to pre/asymptomatic individuals.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of infection over a period of time, contributing to the spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce occupancy density, enhance ventilation, and monitor air quality for early detection of infection risk.","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, CO2 monitoring devices, ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants, visitors, employees in regularly attended spaces.","Owner":"Facility managers, employers, building owners."}]}
